title: Qualified for Series but  not?
body: I qualified for my Gold 2 Series last night. Started playing today and lost my 1st game, and it took me out of it. I won the last two thinking it  might of been a glitch but I'm still in gold 2 :<

replies.body: Checked your account and it looks like you lost one game then dodged another while in series.  While they normally would just be a small LP hit, dodges do also count as a loss in a series (though your MMR remains unaffected). Hope this helps explain what happened.   I do see you're back in series now though, so good luck on the push to Gold 1!

You know, I have had the client freeze on me twice in promo game champ selects which lead to my dodging, I chose the champ I wanted but couldn't lock. Is there any thing you guys can do for that or no?
